data.eml:eml: Description of the larvae and pupae of eight species of the tribe Sitonini Gistel, 1848 (Coleoptera, Curculionidae) from Central Europe

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sprick, Peter (2017): Description of the larvae and pupae of eight species of the tribe Sitonini Gistel, 1848 (Coleoptera, Curculionidae) from Central Europe. Zootaxa 4324 (3): 401-435, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4324.3.1
